message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I'm aiming a little higher.  Let's make this work.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money. This offer is a good compromise - let's close the deal.
Alice, we're getting close. I've adjusted my position, hoping you can meet me halfway.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.  Take it or leave it.
